name: Mahjong Treasures Online
description:
1 000 000 players worldwide! Try unique Mahjong tournament now! Match tiles, win tournaments and travel the world!

● Unique mahjong tournament gameplay.
● 1300+ mahjong pyramids.
● 40+ wonderful countries.
● 10+ bonus mahjong tiles.
● Super boosters: "Fireworks", “Bomb” and “Shuffle”.
● Vivid graphics and festive atmosphere!
